mn144:3.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
mn144:3.3: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā ca sāriputto āyasmā ca mahācundo āyasmā ca channo gijjhakūṭe pabbate viharanti.
mn144:3.4: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā channo ābādhiko hoti dukkhito bāḷhagilāno.
mn144:3.5: Atha kho āyasmā sāriputto sāyanhasamayaṃ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito yenāyasmā mahācundo tenupasaṅkami;
mn144:3.8: “Evamāvuso”ti kho āyasmā mahācundo āyasmato sāriputtassa paccassosi.
mn144:4.1: Atha kho āyasmā ca sāriputto āyasmā ca mahācundo yenāyasmā channo tenupasaṅkamiṃsu;
mn144:4.3: Sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu.
mn144:4.4: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā sāriputto āyasmantaṃ channaṃ etadavoca:
mn144:4.5: “kacci te, āvuso channa, khamanīyaṃ, kacci yāpanīyaṃ?
mn144:4.6: Kacci te dukkhā vedanā paṭikkamanti, no abhikkamanti;
mn144:5.1: “Na me, āvuso sāriputta, khamanīyaṃ na yāpanīyaṃ.
mn144:5.2: Bāḷhā me dukkhā vedanā abhikkamanti, no paṭikkamanti;
mn144:5.4: Seyyathāpi, āvuso sāriputta, balavā puriso tiṇhena sikharena muddhani abhimattheyya;
mn144:5.5: evameva kho me, āvuso sāriputta, adhimattā vātā muddhani ūhananti.
mn144:5.6: Na me, āvuso sāriputta, khamanīyaṃ na yāpanīyaṃ.
mn144:5.7: Bāḷhā me dukkhā vedanā abhikkamanti, no paṭikkamanti;
mn144:5.9: Seyyathāpi, āvuso sāriputta, balavā puriso daḷhena varattakkhaṇḍena sīse sīsaveṭhaṃ dadeyya;
mn144:5.10: evameva kho me, āvuso sāriputta, adhimattā sīse sīsavedanā.
mn144:5.11: Na me, āvuso sāriputta, khamanīyaṃ na yāpanīyaṃ.
mn144:5.12: Bāḷhā me dukkhā vedanā abhikkamanti, no paṭikkamanti;
mn144:5.14: Seyyathāpi, āvuso sāriputta, dakkho goghātako vā goghātakantevāsī vā tiṇhena govikantanena kucchiṃ parikanteyya;
mn144:5.15: evameva kho me, āvuso sāriputta, adhimattā vātā kucchiṃ parikantanti.
mn144:5.16: Na me, āvuso sāriputta, khamanīyaṃ na yāpanīyaṃ.
mn144:5.17: Bāḷhā me dukkhā vedanā abhikkamanti, no paṭikkamanti;
mn144:5.19: Seyyathāpi, āvuso sāriputta, dve balavanto purisā dubbalataraṃ purisaṃ nānābāhāsu gahetvā aṅgārakāsuyā santāpeyyuṃ samparitāpeyyuṃ;
mn144:5.20: evameva kho me, āvuso sāriputta, adhimatto kāyasmiṃ ḍāho.
mn144:5.21: Na me, āvuso sāriputta, khamanīyaṃ na yāpanīyaṃ.
mn144:5.22: Bāḷhā me dukkhā vedanā abhikkamanti, no paṭikkamanti;
mn144:5.24: Satthaṃ, āvuso sāriputta, āharissāmi, nāvakaṅkhāmi jīvitan”ti.
mn144:6.4: Sace āyasmato channassa natthi sappāyāni bhojanāni, ahaṃ āyasmato channassa sappāyāni bhojanāni pariyesissāmi.
mn144:6.5: Sace āyasmato channassa natthi sappāyāni bhesajjāni, ahaṃ āyasmato channassa sappāyāni bhesajjāni pariyesissāmi.
mn144:6.6: Sace āyasmato channassa natthi patirūpā upaṭṭhākā, ahaṃ āyasmantaṃ channaṃ upaṭṭhahissāmi.
mn144:7.1: “Napi me, āvuso sāriputta, natthi sappāyāni bhojanāni;
mn144:7.4: api cāvuso sāriputta, pariciṇṇo me satthā dīgharattaṃ manāpeneva no amanāpena.
mn144:7.5: Etañhi, āvuso sāriputta, sāvakassa patirūpaṃ yaṃ satthāraṃ paricareyya manāpeneva no amanāpena.
mn144:7.6: ‘Anupavajjaṃ channo bhikkhu satthaṃ āharissatī’ti evametaṃ, āvuso sāriputta, dhārehī”ti. “
mn144:7.7: Puccheyyāma mayaṃ āyasmantaṃ channaṃ kañcideva desaṃ, sace āyasmā channo okāsaṃ karoti pañhassa veyyākaraṇāyā”ti.
mn144:8.1: “Cakkhuṃ, āvuso channa, cakkhuviññāṇaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaviññātabbe dhamme ‘etaṃ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā’ti samanupassasi?
mn144:8.7: manaṃ, āvuso channa, manoviññāṇaṃ manoviññāṇaviññātabbe dhamme ‘etaṃ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā’ti samanupassasī”ti?
mn144:9.1: “Cakkhuṃ, āvuso sāriputta, cakkhuviññāṇaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaviññātabbe dhamme ‘netaṃ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti samanupassāmi.
mn144:9.7: manaṃ, āvuso sāriputta, manoviññāṇaṃ manoviññāṇaviññātabbe dhamme ‘netaṃ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti samanupassāmī”ti.
mn144:10.1: “Cakkhusmiṃ, āvuso channa, cakkhuviññāṇe cakkhuviññāṇaviññātabbesu dhammesu kiṃ disvā kiṃ abhiññāya cakkhuṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaviññātabbe dhamme ‘netaṃ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti samanupassasi?
mn144:10.6: manasmiṃ, āvuso channa, manoviññāṇe manoviññāṇaviññātabbesu dhammesu kiṃ disvā kiṃ abhiññāya manaṃ manoviññāṇaṃ manoviññāṇaviññātabbe dhamme ‘netaṃ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti samanupassasī”ti?
mn144:11.1: “Cakkhusmiṃ, āvuso sāriputta, cakkhuviññāṇe cakkhuviññāṇaviññātabbesu dhammesu nirodhaṃ disvā nirodhaṃ abhiññāya cakkhuṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaviññātabbe dhamme ‘netaṃ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti samanupassāmi.
mn144:11.6: manasmiṃ, āvuso sāriputta, manoviññāṇe manoviññāṇaviññātabbesu dhammesu nirodhaṃ disvā nirodhaṃ abhiññāya manaṃ manoviññāṇaṃ manoviññāṇaviññātabbe dhamme ‘netaṃ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti samanupassāmī”ti.
mn144:12.1: Evaṃ vutte, āyasmā mahācundo āyasmantaṃ channaṃ etadavoca:
mn144:12.2: “tasmātiha, āvuso channa, idampi tassa bhagavato sāsanaṃ, niccakappaṃ manasi kātabbaṃ:
mn144:12.4: Calite asati passaddhi, passaddhiyā sati nati na hoti.
mn144:12.7: Cutūpapāte asati nevidha na huraṃ na ubhayamantarena.
mn144:12.9: Atha kho āyasmā ca sāriputto āyasmā ca mahācundo āyasmantaṃ channaṃ iminā ovādena ovaditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkamiṃsu.
mn144:13.1: Atha kho āyasmā channo acirapakkante āyasmante ca sāriputte āyasmante ca mahācunde satthaṃ āharesi.
mn144:13.2: Atha kho āyasmā sāriputto yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
mn144:13.4: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā sāriputto bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
mn144:13.7: “Nanu te, sāriputta, channena bhikkhunā sammukhāyeva anupavajjatā byākatā”ti?
mn144:13.10: “Honti hete, sāriputta, channassa bhikkhuno mittakulāni suhajjakulāni upavajjakulāni.
mn144:13.12: Yo kho, sāriputta, imañca kāyaṃ nikkhipati aññañca kāyaṃ upādiyati tamahaṃ ‘saupavajjo’ti vadāmi.
mn144:13.14: ‘Anupavajjo channo bhikkhu satthaṃ āharesī’ti evametaṃ, sāriputta, dhārehī”ti.
mn144:14.2: Attamano āyasmā sāriputto bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinandīti.
